chat_history.message:
Hello, My iPhone 13 has the above problem: I have a VAT ID number, which was missing in my last order. I had to report it afterwards, so it was taken into account. Now I couldn't enter this anywhere in my new order. Is my VAT ID number stored with my data? Not that it's missing again now. My VAT ID is DE265 713 692. With friendly greetings

Thank you very much for your help,

Dear Backcare,

We take note of the customer's VAT number.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

Attached is the invoice with the updated VAT number for the customer's reference. The order is currently being shipped under the tracking number 1ZBF1560D901214807.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

According to the tracking link, the parcel has been delivered to the customer on 11th June. If the customer requires no further assistance, kindly close the case. Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Hello ecomobile,

The customer asked us: is this a 19% bill? This is an intra-Community supply or differentiated taxation § 25a USTG. The retailer is from the Netherlands, I bought with a VAT ID, so the information about this should be on the invoice. The order had no ID number and cost 429.95€, i.e. with statutory sales tax. So now it would have to be a different invoice value. Please clarify. Thank you.

Thank you for understanding,
Fabio from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Please tell the customer that 429.95€ is pretax amount and we have taken into account his VAT number in the invoice.

Thank you.

Regards,
KW
